author: hilmer
msg: This commit fixes BUG 24885. James did not handle multihomedness of SMTP hosts.
The fix adds a new method and inner class to MailetContext of the mailet api.

author: darrell
msg: - Make sure FLAGS response is added to FETCH when SEEN flag is implicitly set.
- Order of elements in FETCH response is now fixed.

author: darrell
msg: - Copy all messages when inbox is renamed
- Make sure .SILENT flag doesn't stop concurrent sessions from getting flag updates
- Send UID in fetch response from UID STORE
- Try to improve cleanup in protocol tests when errors occur

author: darrell
msg: - Better in-process protocol testing in Imap: now handles multi-session protocol tests.
- Added a few tests for concurrent mailbox access.
